comments.text:
Imo one of the best BSG themed RTS games was a mod for Sins of a Solar Empire, Sins of the 13th Colony. It never had the polish of Armada 3 or the size and unit variety of SOGE but was still hours of fun to be found 😊

Imo what BSG is just sitting begging for is a First Cylon War era title far closer to that Sins mod. An actual RTS instead of turn based with much larger scale of battle ground to play over and number and type of units that can be fielded. Deadlock already scratched the turn based itch and did it really well. 

Of course there's the other far more glaringly obvious route that I'm honestly surprised hasn't already been done outside game mods, Homeworld. Talk about a perfect fit of genre, style and format.
comments.author: @MoA-Reload...

comments.text:
Game looks interesting may pick it up on sale but real sad deadlock was removed I assume for this game but from this early look I would say deadlock looks and feels much better, the graphics feel more of a mobile game. 

Also Raptor love your content thanks for showing us a wide range of games but for this game I am a big BSG fan watched the og when growing up and the remakes in my 20s,one thing that was bugging me slightly was the way you said dradis it is pronounced dray-dis but you did your best attempt again thanks for showing us the game.
